assets.name: house
assets.description: A house with 2 floors, featuring a pyramid roof and 3 doors. The walls are made of red bricks and the windows are framed in blue.

assets.name: three_cubes
assets.description: A set of three cubes stacked asymmetrically. Each cube is rendered with a smooth metallic finish and varies in color; red, green, and blue.

assets.name: low_poly_car
assets.description: A stylized low poly car, ideal for mobile games. Features include simplified geometric shapes and vibrant colors.

assets.name: high_detail_chair
assets.description: A highly detailed chair with intricate wood carvings and a plush velvet cushion. Perfect for architectural renderings.

assets.name: dynamite_pack
assets.description: A pack of dynamite sticks tied together. Each stick has 'TNT' marked clearly on the side. Used typically in mining operations or demolition.

assets.name: steampunk_clock
assets.description: An ornate wall clock featuring steampunk aesthetics with visible gears and a brass finish.

assets.name: urban_street_lamp
assets.description: A modern street lamp with a sleek design and an LED light, suitable for urban environments.

assets.name: space_shuttle
assets.description: A detailed model of a space shuttle with thermal tiles and realistic rocket boosters.

assets.name: medieval_sword
assets.description: A double-edged medieval sword with a detailed hilt and a worn blade, evoking the age of knights.

assets.name: robotic_arm
assets.description: An industrial robotic arm used for manufacturing, capable of intricate tasks and heavy lifting.

assets.name: pine_tree
assets.description: A tall pine tree, perfect for forest scenes, with detailed bark and lush green needles.

assets.name: victorian_house
assets.description: A Victorian-style house with intricate trim and stained glass windows, evoking 19th-century elegance.

assets.name: water_fountain
assets.description: An ornamental water fountain with a statue of a nymph, perfect for gardens and public parks.

assets.name: retro_tv
assets.description: A vintage television set from the 1950s with a wooden cabinet and a small screen, retro vibes for interior decor.

assets.name: alien_statue
assets.description: A statue depicting an alien life-form, crafted from faux emerald stone, for use in sci-fi or fantasy settings.
